title: We must form an alliance
body: It does not matter whether you re Noxian, Demacian, Shuriman, or anything else. This new boards member, LoL Ergo Urgot, thinks he can waltz in and take our memes, and the title of king. WE MUST TAKE HIM DOWN! He cannot simply take the king's spot! Stealing memes is one thing.. THIS IS ANOTHER!

replies.body: http://i.imgur.com/1s2XCa6.jpg
**cough** ?noredirect **cough**

**WE MUST UNITE**

We've bested that Urgot for now, but he shall be back

Those who think they are a part of Noxus, Zaun, Ionia, Piltover, Demacia, The Void or some other place

**FOR THIS, THEY MUST BE DISREGARDED**

This fight... Isn't for who shall rule, Nor, is it a simple meme war

It is a Meme War... Yes

But this is for more than just popularity and upvotes

**THIS IS FOR THE MEME'S AND GAMES BOARD**

And I know each and everyone of you regulars care about it and have an opinion on it. 

And I know many of you, care for Fish, and some are still holding misplaced resentment for Airman, and potentially me. 

Regardless of that... We have new foe to potentially deal with, and I for one, don't know who he is bringing with him. 

But I do know, we can beat him... Together. 

**SO LET'S TAKE HIM, AND ALL OF HIS ALIEN FRIENDS AND SHOW HIM, THAT EVEN IN THE MIDST OF THIS CHAOS..**

**THAT WE WILL NOT SUBMIT TO A FALSE RULER**

**WHO STANDS WITH US?**

Also I think someone down voted u. Upvoted because truth.

splinter groups of deluded loyalists are using extremist and guerilla tactics to strike from the shadows with DED's (downvote explosive devices) following the resolution to the recent conflict, some, including aqualious, airman, hades, and myself, have been targeted, watch what you say, they have no regard for board life and reputation and will not hesitate to strike without discrimination, of ships, mains, or ratings.

What sun said in English:

We've been tagged with Downvote bots

They get is 25-50% of the time

If Memes & Games falls now, I'll never get my cookies from Airman! To save the cookies, I will stand even with Demacians! 

FIGHT!
https://media.giphy.com/media/l41YAytEQd2Tiwm9W/giphy.gif
{{champion:268}} Shurima will not stand for this dishonor to the memes and games board. All who would follow the Emperor of Sands unite against this new threat.
Zaun is verily where it is at. Join me and join Zaun.
Fool. I did not spend a thousand years in the afterlife to be fooled by the likes of you. I am the Chosen of the Sun, Emperor of Shurima and you are but a man who claims to be more.
Let's bring him to his knees
I wonder about the history of your name.... does it have to do with actual peanut butter or a certain PBG?

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Darkstar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=tLwlzLMA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-14T22:38:11.289+0000)
>
> I wonder about the history of your name.... does it have to do with actual peanut butter or a certain PBG?

A certain PBG. xD, I failed. It was all I could think of though
WE just finished a meme war, one that caused much strife. is it a good thing to be starting another?

The one that passed... STUPID

This one... Actually to preserve the Damn Board... Without Fish, that Urgot wants power

And he may come with friends

you could say we have to 

{{champion:98}}: STAND UNITED?

get mellodenous here. we need his power
Everyone who does not believe in Memes and Games board, exit now. This is not a fight for popularity. THIS IS A FIGHT FOR M&G!!!!!

Never will a Demacian stand alongside a Noxian willingly!  Not even for the memes!

Don't worry, the true meme king of League will come and put this pretender in his place.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=tLwlzLMA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-14T22:33:49.782+0000)

>
> http://i.imgur.com/1s2XCa6.jpg

Agreed.

https://memecrunch.com/meme/7VTQO/one-by-one-they-fall/image.jpg?w=553&c=1

I have been shit posting before the this universe began. Have I been banned from countless forums. Maybe, but here in the disarray, I shall finally succeed. Never have I witnessed such an absence of harmony.
We have our own balance, this place is ours and you aren't taking it

Time will tell the story. This has yet to be seen for wounds still fester and the pus is still lacking in the wound.

"but it's pus that drinks foul humors and restores the blood. "

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/elderscrolls/images/e/e7/KeshTheClean.png/revision/latest?cb=20120929002312

First mistake...

Underestimating us

> [{quoted}](name=LoL Ergo Urgot,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=tLwlzLMA,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-07-18T19:43:39.725+0000)
>
> https://memecrunch.com/meme/7VTQO/one-by-one-they-fall/image.jpg?w=553&c=1
> 
> I have been shit posting before the this universe began. Have I been banned from countless forums. Maybe, but here in the disarray, I shall finally succeed. Never have I witnessed such an absence of harmony.

You shall never win. Leave, before we call the mods.
The frejlord has no patience for those who refuse to die.  It has even less patience for those who steal.
My undead soldiers stand with you. We will stop the urgot.
We must make sure there are no usurpers. The one that is finished now was negligible. This is to save the board.
When he shows himself once more, we must strike!
